titleStmt.title: The invincible pride of women: or, The London tradesman's lamentation, for the prodigality of his wife, whith doth daily pillage his purse. To the tune of the Spinning-wheel. Licensed according to order.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for P[hilip]. Brooksby, J[onah]. Deacon, J[osiah]. Blare, J[ohn]. Back,

notesStmt.note: Verse: "I have a wife, the more's my care ..."
Date, place of publication and publishers' names from Wing.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University, Houghton Library.
